name: litrevtool
description: LitRevTool - Google Scholar Literature Review Tool

scripts.deploy:prod: cd frontend && npm run build:prod && sudo mkdir -p /var/www/litrev && sudo cp -r build/* /var/www/litrev/ && sudo chown -R www-data:www-data /var/www/litrev && echo 'Frontend deployed to /var/www/litrev'
scripts.install:all: echo 'ğŸ“¦ Installing backend dependencies...' && cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt && deactivate && cd .. && echo 'ğŸ“¦ Installing frontend dependencies...' && cd frontend && npm install && cd .. && echo 'âœ… All dependencies installed!'
scripts.setup:db: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python3 -c "from app.db.session import engine; from app.models import Base; Base.metadata.create_all(bind=engine); print('Database initialized')" && deactivate && cd ..
scripts.monitor:
pm2 status && echo '
--- CPU & Memory Usage ---' && top -bn1 | grep 'Cpu\|Mem' && echo '
--- Port Usage ---' && sudo lsof -i -P -n | grep LISTEN | grep -E ':(3001|8000|6379)' && echo '
--- Recent Backend Logs ---' && tail -n 10 backend/logs/backend-out.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No backend logs yet' && echo '
--- Recent Frontend Logs ---' && tail -n 10 frontend/logs/frontend-out.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No frontend logs yet'
scripts.clean:restart: npm run kill:port && npm run restart
scripts.reset:
echo 'ğŸ”„ Starting full system reset...' && echo '
1ï¸âƒ£  Stopping all PM2 processes...' && pm2 stop all 2>/dev/null || true && sleep 1 && echo '
2ï¸âƒ£  Killing any stuck processes on ports 3001, 8000...' && (lsof -ti:3001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true) && (lsof -ti:8000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true) && echo '
3ï¸âƒ£  Clearing Celery task queue and results in Redis...' && redis-cli FLUSHDB && echo '
4ï¸âƒ£  Cleaning up any orphaned Playwright/Chromium processes...' && pkill -f 'chromium|playwright' 2>/dev/null || true && echo '
5ï¸âƒ£  Clearing old screenshots (keeping DB data)...' && find backend/uploads/screenshots -name '*.png' -type f -delete 2>/dev/null || true && echo '
6ï¸âƒ£  Clearing PM2 logs...' && pm2 flush && echo '
7ï¸âƒ£  Resetting any stuck search jobs to failed state...' && cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python3 -c "from app.db.session import SessionLocal; from app.models import SearchJob; db = SessionLocal(); stuck = db.query(SearchJob).filter(SearchJob.status.in_(['running', 'pending'])).all(); [setattr(job, 'status', 'failed') or setattr(job, 'status_message', 'Reset by system cleanup') for job in stuck]; db.commit(); print(f'Reset {len(stuck)} stuck jobs'); db.close()" 2>/dev/null || echo 'No stuck jobs to reset' && deactivate && cd .. && echo '
8ï¸âƒ£  Starting all services fresh...' && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js && sleep 2 && echo '
9ï¸âƒ£  Verifying services...' && pm2 status && echo '
âœ… Reset complete! System ready for new executions.
' && echo 'ğŸ“Š Quick health check:' && sleep 2 && curl -s http://localhost:8000/docs > /dev/null && echo '  âœ“ Backend API responding' || echo '  âœ— Backend not ready' && curl -s http://localhost:3001 > /dev/null && echo '  âœ“ Frontend responding' || echo '  âœ— Frontend not ready' && redis-cli ping > /dev/null && echo '  âœ“ Redis responding' || echo '  âœ— Redis not ready'
scripts.debug: bash -c "echo 'ğŸ” LitRevTool Debug Information' && echo '================================' && echo '' && echo 'ğŸ“Š Service Status:' && pm2 status && echo '' && echo 'ğŸ—„ï¸  Database Status:' && cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python3 -c \"from app.db.session import SessionLocal; from app.models import SearchJob, User, Paper; from sqlalchemy import func; db = SessionLocal(); print(f'  Total Users: {db.query(func.count(User.id)).scalar()}'); print(f'  Total Jobs: {db.query(func.count(SearchJob.id)).scalar()}'); pending = db.query(func.count(SearchJob.id)).filter(SearchJob.status == 'pending').scalar(); running = db.query(func.count(SearchJob.id)).filter(SearchJob.status == 'running').scalar(); completed = db.query(func.count(SearchJob.id)).filter(SearchJob.status == 'completed').scalar(); failed = db.query(func.count(SearchJob.id)).filter(SearchJob.status == 'failed').scalar(); print(f'  Jobs - Pending: {pending}, Running: {running}, Completed: {completed}, Failed: {failed}'); print(f'  Total Papers: {db.query(func.count(Paper.id)).scalar()}'); db.close()\" && deactivate && cd .. && echo '' && echo 'ğŸ“¡ Redis Status:' && redis-cli ping > /dev/null && echo '  Status: Connected' || echo '  Status: Disconnected' && echo '  Celery Queue Length: '$(redis-cli llen celery) && echo '' && echo 'ğŸ”¥ Recent Celery Errors:' && tail -20 backend/logs/celery-error.log 2>/dev/null | grep -E 'ERROR|Error|Exception|Traceback' || echo '  No recent errors' && echo '' && echo 'ğŸ“¸ Recent Screenshots:' && ls -lht backend/uploads/screenshots/ 2>/dev/null | head -6 || echo '  No screenshots' && echo '' && echo 'ğŸŒ Endpoint Health:' && curl -s http://localhost:8000/health | python3 -m json.tool 2>/dev/null || echo '  Backend not responding'"
scripts.debug:jobs: bash -c "echo 'ğŸ” Checking stuck/running jobs...' && echo '' && cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python3 -c \"from app.db.session import SessionLocal; from app.models import SearchJob; from datetime import datetime; db = SessionLocal(); jobs = db.query(SearchJob).filter(SearchJob.status.in_(['running', 'pending'])).all(); print(f'Found {len(jobs)} jobs in running/pending state:'); print(''); [print(f'  â€¢ Job: {job.name}\\n    ID: {job.id}\\n    Status: {job.status}\\n    Created: {job.created_at}\\n    Message: {job.status_message}\\n    Papers: {job.total_papers_found}\\n') for job in jobs]; db.close()\" && deactivate"
scripts.debug:reset-jobs: bash -c "echo 'ğŸ”„ Resetting stuck jobs...' && echo '' && cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python3 -c \"from app.db.session import SessionLocal; from app.models import SearchJob; db = SessionLocal(); stuck = db.query(SearchJob).filter(SearchJob.status.in_(['running', 'pending'])).all(); print(f'Found {len(stuck)} stuck jobs:'); [print(f'  - {job.name} ({job.status})') for job in stuck]; [setattr(job, 'status', 'failed') or setattr(job, 'status_message', 'Reset by debug command') for job in stuck]; db.commit(); print(f''); print(f'âœ“ Reset {len(stuck)} jobs to failed state'); db.close()\" && deactivate"
scripts.debug:errors:
echo 'ğŸ”¥ Recent Celery Errors:
' && tail -50 backend/logs/celery-error.log 2>/dev/null | grep -A 3 -E 'ERROR|Error|Exception' || echo 'No recent errors found'
scripts.debug:health:
echo 'ğŸ¥ System Health Check
' && echo '1. Services:' && pm2 status | grep -E 'litrev-backend|litrev-celery|litrev-frontend' && echo '
2. Backend API:' && curl -s http://localhost:8000/health && echo '

3. Redis:' && redis-cli ping && echo '
4. Celery Queue:' && redis-cli llen celery && echo ' tasks in queue' && echo '
5. Disk Space:' && df -h | grep -E 'Filesystem|/$' && echo '
6. Memory:' && free -h | grep -E 'total|Mem'
scripts.debug:last-job: bash -c "echo 'ğŸ“‹ Last Search Job Details:' && echo '' && cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python3 -c \"from app.db.session import SessionLocal; from app.models import SearchJob; db = SessionLocal(); job = db.query(SearchJob).order_by(SearchJob.created_at.desc()).first(); [print(f'{k}: {v}') for k,v in {'Name': job.name, 'ID': job.id, 'Status': job.status, 'Created': job.created_at, 'Started': job.started_at, 'Completed': job.completed_at, 'Message': job.status_message, 'Papers': job.total_papers_found, 'Progress': str(job.progress)+'%', 'Keywords': job.keywords_include, 'Years': str(job.start_year)+'-'+str(job.end_year)}.items()] if job else print('No jobs found'); db.close()\" && deactivate"
scripts.debug:screenshots:
echo 'ğŸ“¸ Recent Screenshots:
' && ls -lht backend/uploads/screenshots/ 2>/dev/null | head -10 || echo 'No screenshots found'
